name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made With Her
storyline:
Winter of his senior year at university.
Futaro Uesugi was on his way from Tokyo to his hometown.
On the way, he remembered the summer vacation of his first year of college.
He entered a university in Tokyo and was busy with his studies and part-time job.
He confessed his love to his girlfriend and their long-distance relationship was going well.
But still, he was somewhat unsatisfied with his long-distance relationship with his girlfriend.
But then she decides to come to Tokyo for the summer holidays.
He wants to spend a wonderful time together, bridging the distance of living apart.
With these thoughts in mind, Futaro greets her with joy and nervousness at seeing her for the first time in a long time.
How will their date end?
summary: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made with Her is the third The Quintessential Quintuplets romance visual novel developed by MAGES. The theme this time is “heart-pounding summer vacation dates.” As for what kind of story will unfold this time, more information will be shared in future announcements.
